steps.description: We discuss your challenges and goals. If I can help, and you like what you hear, we move on.
The team and I workshop a current challenge together. You get to know me, I learn about them and the business, plus we deliver something valuable.
Now we've met, you and the team decide if you'd like to continue working with me. If so, we move on. If not, no problem.
If we decide to continue, I'll put together a tailored programme for ~1-3 months, focused on the most pressing product and team challenges.

steps.step: The team(s) and I get cracking.
steps.description: I work with the team. We regularly review progress against outcomes, with a rolling monthly contract available for peace of mind.
